sentences: What a nice ending, don’t you think, Blake? Sure would have made a good family photo. I'm sad we couldn’t squeeze a little more use out of you before you... snapped.
Why... what do you mean by that?

Oh, come on. You know exactly what I mean. You think this was all some accident? Some tragic story of a broken hitman losing their grip? You were useful until you weren’t. And now, well... here we are.
That's... okay. I never want to see you again.
Good. Makes this a hell of a lot easier.
You know, I actually thought you might reach the stars one day. Sad story. You had potential—real fucking potential. But there was one thing you lacked: courage.
No one should be good at this. No one should want this.
Maybe you’re right. Maybe we’re all fucking insane. But at least I’m not a coward. At least I’ve made my peace with it.
You couldn’t even keep it together long enough to be useful. You cracked, and you broke. You disgust me.
<action=doorNoise><wait=0.1><speed=2>You were so fucking pathetic you couldn't even kill yourself.<action=blakeShot>
